meta.title: Latest Rotations - Rotate to Escape News
meta.description: Stay updated with the latest news, updates, and community highlights from the Rotate to Escape universe.

pageSubtitle: Stay updated with the newest twists and turns in the Rotate to Escape universe

articles.title: Major Update: 50 New Levels Added to Rotate to Escape!
articles.excerpt: We're thrilled to announce the biggest content update yet! Discover 50 brand new levels featuring innovative rotation mechanics, new trap types, and mind-bending puzzles that will test even the most experienced players.

articles.title: Community Spotlight: Player Creates Incredible Speed Run Record
articles.excerpt: Australian player 'RotationMaster_AU' has shattered the previous speed run record, completing all 100 levels in just 47 minutes! Watch the incredible run and learn the advanced techniques used.

articles.title: Developer Diary: The Art of Designing Rotation Puzzles
articles.excerpt: Go behind the scenes with our lead puzzle designer as they share insights into creating challenging yet fair rotation-based puzzles. Learn about the design philosophy that makes each level unique.

articles.title: Mobile Version Coming Soon: Rotate on the Go!
articles.excerpt: The mobile version of Rotate to Escape is entering final testing phases. Experience the same mind-bending puzzles with touch-optimized controls designed specifically for mobile devices.

articles.title: Tips from the Pros: Advanced Rotation Strategies
articles.excerpt: Learn from the best players in the community! This comprehensive guide covers advanced techniques, optimal rotation patterns, and time-saving strategies for competitive play.

articles.title: Holiday Event: Festive Rotation Challenges Available Now
articles.excerpt: Celebrate the season with special holiday-themed levels! These limited-time challenges feature festive decorations and unique rotation mechanics. Complete them all to unlock exclusive rewards.
